title: Small ditrigonal dodecicosidodecahedron
summary: In geometry, the small ditrigonal dodecicosidodecahedron (or small dodekified icosidodecahedron) is a nonconvex uniform polyhedron, indexed as U43. It has 44 faces (20 triangles, 12 pentagrams and 12 decagons), 120 edges, and 60 vertices.[1] Its vertex figure is a crossed quadrilateral.
